thread.title: XDBS Named Asia's Greatest Brand 2017 by AsiaOne, Tops the List for Its Large-Size B2B Marketing Operations

author: cnbc.com
title: XDBS Named Asia's Greatest Brand 2017 by AsiaOne, Tops the List for Its Large-Size B2B Marketing Operations
text:
REDWOOD CITY, Calif., Feb. 28, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- XDBS announced today that it has been named Asia's Greatest Brand for 2017 in the second edition of Asia's Greatest Brands & Leaders 2017 held at the Roselle Junior Ballroom of Marina Bay Sands Expo and Conventions Centre, Singapore, on Jan 29, 2017. The event was a magnificent success, highlighted by the presence of the Ukranian Ambassador, His Excellency Dmytro Senik, and several other top business dignitaries of Asia. The process was reviewed by PricewaterhouseCoopers.
XDBS is a tech firm focused on B2B marketing and lead generation with a proven track record for helping publishers, agencies and technology companies execute their marketing and media plans successfully. XDBS' custom solutions drive high ROI for its clients and engage at multiple levels to provide marketing and sales-ready leads.
"XDBS has set the standard for innovation and creativity in the B2B demand generation sector and is now the largest company of its kind in Asia. We're proud of the fact that we help over 100 technology brands succeed in their worldwide marketing plans," said Julie Strong, CEO of XDBS. "We are happy to receive this recognition. This goes to all of the 1,100-plus employees that work for us globally."
Ms. Strong, who is based out of XDBS' Redwood City office, continues, "We have a strong foothold in North America and we are now gearing up for the next level of growth here. We are looking at expanding our delivery facilities in this region."
On receiving Asia's Greatest Leader Award, XDBS' Founder/Chairman Kartik Anand says, "I thank AsiaOne for this recognition. It's a pleasure to lead XDBS' global team as it continues to innovate and grow while addressing customer needs."
ABOUT XDBS
XDBS Corporation is a U.S.-based B2B demand generation and marketing company. These solutions are created, delivered and managed via its network of five-plus delivery locations covering an extensive base of over 20 million active technology buyers worldwide.
